page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT IN NAIRN
page.content: The catchment area for our school{ {Millbank}is mainly four council housing schemes and an area of privately owned housing called the{ {Fishertown.}We obtained our statistics about employment in our area by sending home survey sheets with{ {Millbank}pupils.From the{124}sheets returned on{male}employment we found the principal employers were{ {McDermotts}builders of off shore oil platforms{35,tourist related {industries 7,bulding trades 7,oil {related work 7 and 12 men were {unemployed.}The remaining distribution was evenly spread over the traditional industries.Ofthe{119}survey sheets returned by{females 34}were { {housewives,24}were{unemployed 10} worked in {shops,9}in{Education,6}were {cleaners}and the remainder in traditional jobs.
